name: part_000
file: tmp_【#SSholoX1周年】世界の全てを見せてやろう【お披露目満載！？】 [fzlZDM_M5bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introductory sequence featuring character silhouettes, names, and portraits of the holoX members.
The members perform their individual catchphrases followed by a group introduction and salute.
Transition screen featuring the Secret Society holoX logo.
MC section in a clubroom setting. The members explain that La+ is absent due to illness and discuss their goals for their second year.

subtitles.original: そこに跪け
subtitles.english: Kneel before me.

subtitles.original: 吐いて捨てるような現実は
subtitles.english: A reality you'd spit out and throw away...

subtitles.original: 一刀両断叩き切る
subtitles.english: I'll cut it down with a single stroke!

subtitles.original: 終わりなき因縁に惑いし凝らよ
subtitles.english: To those of you lost in an endless cycle of fate...

subtitles.original: 漆黒の翼でいざなおう
subtitles.english: I shall guide you with my jet-black wings.

subtitles.original: 我らエデンの星を統べるもの。秘密結社...
subtitles.english: We are the rulers of Eden's Star. Secret Society...

subtitles.original: holoX!
subtitles.english: holoX!

subtitles.original: でござる
subtitles.english: I'm here!

subtitles.original: 皆の者、かかれー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, charge!

subtitles.original: イエス・マイ・ダーク！
subtitles.english: Yes, My Dark!

subtitles.original:
holoX 1周年!!
新メンバー登場!!
みんなでアイドル衣装ライブ
ユニットオリジナル楽曲
subtitles.english:
holoX 1st Anniversary!!
New member appearance!!
Everyone in idol costumes live
Unit original song

subtitles.original: はい、ということでやっぱりラプラスが口上やらないと締まらないな
subtitles.english: Right, it just doesn't feel right without La+ doing the intro spiel.

subtitles.original: ねー、真ん中いなかったですねー。
subtitles.english: Yeah, the center was empty.

subtitles.original: というわけでオープニングね、見ていただいた方気づいたと思いますが
subtitles.english: So, for those who watched the opening, you might have noticed...

subtitles.original: 先ほどもね、Twitterでも報告がありました
subtitles.english: ...as we also reported on Twitter just now,

subtitles.original: 本日ね、ラプラスはちょっと体調不良でお休みとなり
subtitles.english: La+ is taking the day off today due to feeling unwell,

subtitles.original: 私たち4人でやらせていただきますので、よろしくお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: so the four of us will be hosting. We're counting on you!

subtitles.original: お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: おやすみー！ゆっくり休んでね！
subtitles.english: Get well soon! Take a good rest!

subtitles.original: いい子に寝てるんだぞ、わかったな！
subtitles.english: Make sure you're being a good girl and sleeping, okay?

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあね。ラプラスがホワイトボードにね、今回の配信の概要を書いてくれてるんで
subtitles.english: Alright then. La+ wrote an outline of today's stream on the whiteboard,

subtitles.original: みんな... え、ちょっと違うわ
subtitles.english: so everyone... wait, that's not right.

subtitles.original: え？大丈夫？大丈夫？大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Huh? You okay? You okay?

subtitles.original: ということでみんな集まってください
subtitles.english: Anyway, everyone, gather around.

subtitles.original: バレないように最初から間違えてます
subtitles.english: She made a mistake right from the start to hide it.

subtitles.original: ラプラスに任せると、ラプラスちゃんちょっと調子が悪いんでござる
subtitles.english: Whenever we leave it to La+, she's always a bit off-kilter.

subtitles.original: ルイルイに任せるみたいな流れがいつもあるからねー
subtitles.english: It always ends up being left to Lui-lui.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで私たちの目標は何ですか、皆さん？
subtitles.english: Right, so, what are our goals, everyone?

subtitles.original: えっと、2年目も頑張る！
subtitles.english: Umm, let's do our best in our second year!

subtitles.original: いっぱい寝る！
subtitles.english: Sleep a lot!

subtitles.original: 元気に過ごす！
subtitles.english: Stay healthy!

subtitles.original: え、それはみんなのね、目標ね
subtitles.english: Uh, those are just your personal goals.

subtitles.original: ホロックスとしての目標は何ですか？
subtitles.english: What are our goals as holoX?

subtitles.original: 2年目も頑張る！
subtitles.english: Do our best in our second year!

subtitles.original: 楽しむ！
subtitles.english: Have fun!

subtitles.original: 健やかに生きる！
subtitles.english: Live healthily!

subtitles.original: ラプラスが後で見たら泣くよ
subtitles.english: La+ is going to cry when she sees this later.
